questions.question: What is the unique tokenomics structure of Shiba Coin?
answers: Unlimited supply with a 5% fee on all transactions
Limited supply of one quadrillion tokens with a 5% fee on all transactions, with 2.5% burned and 2.5% distributed to existing holders
Limited supply of one billion tokens with a 10% fee on all transactions, with 5% burned and 5% distributed to existing holders
Unlimited supply with a 10% fee on all transactions, with 5% burned and 5% distributed to existing holders

questions.question: What is the main difference between Shiba Coin and other cryptocurrencies?
answers: Shiba Coin is built on the Ethereum blockchain
Shiba Coin has a strong community of supporters
Shiba Coin has a unique tokenomics structure
All of the above

questions.question: What are ERC-20 tokens?
answers: A type of cryptocurrency that represents unique assets or digital collectibles
A type of cryptocurrency that is built on the Ethereum blockchain and has the same smart contract functionality as other ERC-20 tokens
A mechanism used by some cryptocurrencies to reduce the total supply of tokens in circulation
A type of decentralized exchange built on the Ethereum blockchain

questions.question: What are NFTs?
answers: A type of cryptocurrency that represents unique assets or digital collectibles
A type of cryptocurrency that is built on the Ethereum blockchain and has the same smart contract functionality as other ERC-20 tokens
A mechanism used by some cryptocurrencies to reduce the total supply of tokens in circulation
A type of decentralized exchange built on the Ethereum blockchain

questions.question: What is the potential impact of supply changes on the value of a cryptocurrency?
answers: It can increase the value of the token by creating a scarcity effect
It can reduce the value of the token by diluting its value
Both A and B
None of the above
